messages.content:
Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Give me top 3 italian movies in 2023###SELECT

m.`title`,m.`popularity` FROM `repo`.`movie` m JOIN `repo`.`language` l ON m.`original_language`=l.`iso_639_1` WHERE l.`english_name`='Italian' AND YEAR(m.`release_date`)=2023 ORDER BY m.`popularity` DESC LIMIT 3

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Give me the most common genre in telugu movies###SELECT

`genre`.`name` AS most_common_genre, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM `repo`.`movie` INNER JOIN `repo`.`movie_genres` ON `repo`.`movie`.`id` = `repo`.`movie_genres`.`movie_id` INNER JOIN `repo`.`genre` ON `repo`.`movie_genres`.`genre_ids` = `repo`.`genre`.`id` WHERE `repo`.`movie`.`original_language` = (SELECT `iso_639_1` FROM `repo`.`language` WHERE `english_name` = 'Telugu') GROUP BY `genre`.`name` ORDER BY `movie_count` DESC LIMIT 1

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Which language has the highest number of movies released? Give me the top three languages.###SELECT

`language`.`name` AS language_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM `repo`.`language` LEFT JOIN `repo`.`movie` ON `repo`.`language`.`iso_639_1` = `repo`.`movie`.`original_language` GROUP BY `language_name` ORDER BY movie_count DESC LIMIT 3

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###On which day were the highest number of movies released?###SELECT
DATE(`release_date`) AS release_day,COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM `repo`.`movie` GROUP BY `release_day` ORDER BY `movie_count` DESC LIMIT 1

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Which month saw the highest number of releases for Telugu movies?###SELECT

MONTHNAME(`release_date`) AS release_month, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM `repo`.`movie` WHERE UCASE(`repo`.`movie`.`original_language`) = (SELECT UCASE(`iso_639_1`) FROM `repo`.`language` WHERE `english_name` = 'Telugu') GROUP BY release_month ORDER BY movie_count DESC LIMIT 1

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Give me more information about the movie Virupaksha###SELECT

`original_title`, `language`.`name` AS language_name, `release_date`, `overview`, `popularity` FROM `repo`.`movie` LEFT JOIN `repo`.`language` ON `movie`.`original_language` = `language`.`iso_639_1` WHERE `title` = 'Virupaksha'

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Give me the most common genre year on year starting from 1990###SELECT

`release_year`, `genre_name` AS most_common_genre FROM (SELECT YEAR(`release_date`) AS release_year, `genre`.`name` AS genre_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY YEAR(`release_date`) ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rn FROM `repo`.`movie` INNER JOIN `repo`.`movie_genres` ON `repo`.`movie`.`id` = `repo`.`movie_genres`.`movie_id` INNER JOIN `repo`.`genre` ON `repo`.`movie_genres`.`genre_ids` = `repo`.`genre`.`id` WHERE YEAR(`release_date`) >= 1990 GROUP BY release_year, genre_name) AS RankedGenres WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY release_year

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Give me top 10 malayalam movies based on popularity###SELECT

`original_title`, `title`, `popularity`, `release_date` FROM `repo`.`movie` WHERE `original_language` = (SELECT `iso_639_1` FROM `repo`.`language` WHERE `english_name` = 'Malayalam') ORDER BY `popularity` DESC LIMIT 10

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Which languages have released the least number of movies?###SELECT

`language`.`name` AS language_name, COUNT(*) AS movie_count FROM `repo`.`language` LEFT JOIN `repo`.`movie` ON `repo`.`language`.`iso_639_1` = `repo`.`movie`.`original_language` GROUP BY `language_name` ORDER BY movie_count LIMIT 5

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Which english movies have genre mystery and science fiction. Order by release date desc and popularity desc###SELECT

m.`original_title`, m.`release_date`, m.`popularity` FROM `repo`.`movie` m INNER JOIN `repo`.`movie_genres` mg ON m.`id` = mg.`movie_id` INNER JOIN `repo`.`genre` g ON mg.`genre_ids` = g.`id` INNER JOIN `repo`.`language` l ON m.`original_language` = l.`iso_639_1` WHERE l.`english_name` = 'English' AND g.`name` IN ('Mystery', 'Science Fiction') ORDER BY m.`release_date` DESC, m.`popularity` DESC

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###5 most common genres in Telugu movies###SELECT

g.`name` AS genre_name, COUNT(*) AS genre_count FROM `repo`.`genre` g JOIN `repo`.`movie_genres` mg ON g.`id` = mg.`genre_ids` JOIN `repo`.`movie` m ON mg.`movie_id` = m.`id` JOIN `repo`.`language` l ON m.`original_language`=l.`iso_639_1` WHERE l.`english_name` = 'Telugu' GROUP BY g.`name` ORDER BY genre_count DESC LIMIT 5

Given the MySQL tables: ###
##genre(id,name,PRIMARY KEY (id))
##language(iso_639_1,english_name,name,PRIMARY KEY (iso_639_1))
##movie_genres(movie_id,genre_ids,KEY (movie_id),CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movie(id))
##movie(id,adult,backdrop_path,original_language,original_title,overview,popularity,poster_path,release_date,title,video,vote_average,vote_count,PRIMARY KEY (id))###Give top 5 telugu movie names###SELECT
`title` FROM `repo`.`movie` WHERE `original_language` = (SELECT `iso_639_1` FROM `repo`.`language` WHERE `english_name` = 'Telugu') ORDER BY `popularity` DESC LIMIT 5
